name: WordMix
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word mix
des:
Players, especially children and adults, improve cognitive areas such as attention and language. They will also enrich their vocabulary. Initially there are 8 categories:

- Colors, Animals, Fruits, Cars, Clothes, States of USA, Months, or Actors

Alexa will spell different words totally randomly depending on the category chosen. Once you get it right, you will automatically go to the next word. Very fun to play with family and friends.

How to play: Alexa open Word Mix and select "Actors"

 Alexa: Next Actor -> s,w,m,t,h,i,l,l,i
 You: Will Smith
 Alexa: Next Actor -> ...


** NOTE: If you have an Echo, we recommend you take a piece of paper and a pen to write down the letters that Alexa will spell. In case you haven't had time to listen, say "repeat" and it will spell the word again.

FEEDBACK
Please leave a review if you like the game. We really appreciate it and it help encourage us to keep working on more great skills for you. Send us an email to info@trilogic.eus if you have any problems or suggestions. We will be happy to hear from you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
